project.name: CloudKid States API
project.description: CloudKid States API: a library providing base classes for making various gamestates

cloudkid.FunctionTask.name: cloudkid.FunctionTask
cloudkid.FunctionTask.description: A task to do some generic async function task

params.name: id
params.description: Alias for this task

params.name: serviceCall
params.description: Function the service call

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to call when the task is completed

params.name: args
params.description: The arguments passed to the service call

cloudkid.FunctionTask.author: Matt Moore

cloudkid.ListTask.name: cloudkid.ListTask
cloudkid.ListTask.description: A task that performs a list of tasks

params.name: id
params.description: Alias for this ListTask

params.name: list
params.description: The list of tasks

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to call when the task is completed

cloudkid.LoadTask.name: cloudkid.LoadTask
cloudkid.LoadTask.description:
Load task is a common type of task used for loading assets
through the MediaLoader

params.name: id
params.description: Alias for the task

params.name: url
params.description: The url from which to load the asset

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call once loading is complete

params.name: updateCallback
params.description: Optional call back to get load progress

params.name: priority
params.description: Media loader priority of the load

params.name: data
params.description: Opitonal loading options

cloudkid.Task.name: cloudkid.Task
cloudkid.Task.description:
A task is used by the Task Manager to do an 
asyncronous task (like loading or playback)

params.name: id
params.description: Alias for the task

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to call when the task is completed

cloudkid.TaskEvent.name: cloudkid.TaskEvent
cloudkid.TaskEvent.description:
Task events are used by the task manager to communicate
when tasks change

params.name: type
params.description: The type of event

params.name: task
params.description: The task this event relates to

params.name: data
params.description: description

cloudkid.TaskManager.name: cloudkid.TaskManager
cloudkid.TaskManager.description:
The task manager is responsible for doing a series
of asyncronous tasks

params.name: tasks
params.description: The series of tasks to do

classitems.description: The url of the file to load

Cancel the TaskManager used for the list of tasks. As the individual tasks are not 
kept track of, this always returns true.

    for the task manager

classitems.description: Called from the task manager when a Task is finished

event onItemLoading

classitems.description: Adds the specified event listener
classitems.name: addEventListener

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event

params.name: listener
params.description: An object with a handleEvent method, or a function that will be called when the event is dispatched

return.description: Returns the listener for chaining or assignment

classitems.description: Removes the specified event listener
classitems.name: removeEventListener

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event

params.name: listener
params.description: The listener function or object

classitems.description: Removes all listeners for the specified type, or all listeners of all types
classitems.name: removeAllEventListeners

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event. If omitted, all listeners for all types will be removed.

classitems.description: Dispatches the specified event
classitems.name: dispatchEvent

params.name: enventObj
params.description: An object with a "type" property, or a string type

params.name: target
params.description: The object to use as the target property of the event object

return.description: Returns true if any listener returned true

classitems.description: Indicates whether there is at least one listener for the specified event type
classitems.name: hasEventListener

params.name: type
params.description: The string type of the event

return.description: Returns true if there is at least one listener for the specified event

If we're paused and should therefore not automatically proceed to the
next task after each task completes
classitems.name: paused

classitems.name: _tasksInProgress

classitems.name: _isDestroyed

classitems.name: process

params.description: The collection of tasks

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback

params.name: startAll
params.description: If we should start all tasks

params.name: immediateDestroy
params.description: Destroy after load

classitems.description: Initializes the task manager

params.name: tasks
params.description: The optional array of tasks, we can also add this later

params.name: task

params.name: tasks

classitems.name: removeAll

classitems.description: Cancels all tasks with a given id
classitems.name: cancelTask

params.name: taskId
params.description: The task id to remove.

classitems.description:
Start the next task in the tasks list. When it is done, the
task's callback will be called.  If the manager is not paused after
the task's callback returns, the manager will start the next task.
classitems.name: startNext

return.description:
The task that was started or null if the list contained no
        tasks to be processed

classitems.description: Callback for when an task is done
classitems.name: onTaskDone

params.name: result
params.description: Result of the task

params.name: task
params.description: Task that is done

classitems.description: Start the next task until there are no more tasks to start
classitems.name: startAll

classitems.description: We don't want to use the task manager after this
classitems.name: destroy
